doc.field: up with executive actions we can take now and in the future to reduce pollution, repair our communities for climate change and speed the transition to more sustainable energy. president obama called for action on climate change saying he wants congress to act and if they don't, he will. joining us is chris hayes. chris, what was that shout out to john mccain and joe lieberman about? that seemed to make john mccain unhappy? he did his patented grimace smile. it was a standard cap and trade bill along the framework of what would later be passed by the house of representatives after
